=93CAN SOMEONE PLEASE PUT RK Saitou in historical Saitou's shoes... RK Sai=
tou surrounded by young impressionable women.=94

~~~ secretarytocapt3 (pos=
t to miburo ML)

 

The Wolf=92s retired from the police force.  What=92s a=
 Wolf to do?  Work at the same girls=92 school that his wife does, of cours=
e.

 

Why did he end up there?  What does he do?  More curious still, what=
 happens when Saitou Hajime and a throng of teen-aged girls encounter each =
other on a daily basis? 

 

The only rule to this challenge is that a stor=
y has to address the theme of the older, retired Saitou working at the girl=
s=92 school that Tokio does --- something he did in real life. (Some of us =
remember Tiffany telling us about him directing rickshaw traffic on rainy d=
ays and apparently one of his main duties was to do number-crunching.)  And=
 while the initial challenge was for it to be the personification of Saitou=
 in Rurouni Kenshin, it=92s open to any characterizations.  Information abo=
ut the historical circumstances should be available in the Files sections o=
f miburo and/or SHQ, or ask specific questions to the SHQ ML.  Information =
will also eventually be available at the central SHQ website at http://www.=
shinsengumihq.com/ as files and such get transferred over.

 

There is no =
deadline.  Upload stories as they=92re in progress or finished into the fol=
der titled =93Saitou and the Girls=94 within the Story Archive folder under=
 Files on the SHQ Spy Division yahoo site, http://groups.yahoo.com/group/sh=
q_spy_division/ .  If your story has several chapters, just create a new fo=
lder for it with the story=92s title within the =93Saitou and the Girls=94 =
folder so all the parts stay together.  No limit on how many chapters it ca=
n be.  Don=92t forget to include the header.

 

And I=92d like to invite a=
rtists to participate as well.  Stories aren=92t just told in words.  Manga=
 and doujinshi artists, you=92re challenged to participate as well.  Upload=
 your entries into the Photos section.

 

Whether it=92s a written story o=
r art form, don=92t forget to let us know it=92s available!  Either send a =
message to the list or click on the notification button during the upload p=
rocess.

 

A copy of this challenge will be available in the Challenge fol=
der.  I=92m also posting it up to the LJ.  If it generates any nibbles from=
 non-SHQSD members, I=92ll let you know.

 

Have fun!
